file_content.text: Your deeds today will ripple throughout the galaxy. Nothing will stop the Empire now.
People of Corellia, citizens of the Empire. Today marks a new beginning. The Green Jedi have repented, the battle for Corellia is over!
Our champion stands before us, fresh from battle. He deserves our deepest respect.
Our champion stands before us, fresh from battle. We owe her our deepest respect.
The heroes standing before you are responsible for this victory. They deserve our tribute.
No existing award fits your triumph. So I bestow, for the first time in galactic history, our newest and highest honor: the Medal of Imperial Glory.
Thank you, Darth Decimus. I'm proud to have freed Corellia from the Republic's tyranny.
I am honored.
As you should be. Your actions have altered the course of the galaxy, and you deserve recognition.
I just won a whole planet for you. Show me your complete admiration.
Keep the accolades coming.
I'm afraid we're all out of medals.
Unless you want this medal on the black market, you better have something else for me.
I deserve more than praise.
Patience. The ceremony's not over yet.
Though our victory was great, it didn't come without sacrifice.
Councillor Darbin Sull tried to negotiate for Corellia's peace. The Green Jedi executed him, repaying his patriotism with death.
As we mourn the loss of Darbin Sull--and all the dearly departed Corellians--we must look to the future.
Effective immediately, the Empire will exercise direct control over Corellia. Together we'll repair the damage wrought by the rebellion.
The Empire won't tolerate further defiance.
Obey your new masters.
Many worlds have had it much worse.
Consider yourselves lucky.
Tell us if you see anything suspicious. The Empire rewards a watchful eye.
Report all disloyal activity.
Keep your noses clean or the new management will blast you.
Don't mess with these Imps.
How generous of the Empire.
And honorable. The entire galaxy will take note.
Let's talk about me again.
Our victory was only possible thanks to your efforts. This planet owes you its future.
Get off Corellia!
Aggghhh!
Councillor Jalta. Who sent you?
No one. Everyone. The people of Corellia won't stand for the Empire's rule.
Only a Sith like you could devastate a planet, kill thousands, then celebrate.
I broke this planet because it foolishly defied the Empire. Now I'll do the same to you.
Don't judge me. [Kill Jalta]
Blasted Sith. You're enjoying this, aren't you?
Few things are more enjoyable than tormenting an entire planet.
Yes. I love it. [Kill Jalta]
And you just stand there. A model of Imperial corruption, not caring at all about the planet you just ruined.
I'm deeply interested in Corellia's future. That's why I'm happy to clean up filth like you.
Oh, I care. [Kill Jalta]
I hope you're happy. Our planet's ruined, and you make off with a ship full of credits.
Winning Corellia earned me more than credits. You, I'll kill for free.
I'm very happy. [Kill Jalta]
And you just stand there, surveying your new domain. I'd spit in your face if I had the strength.
Don't pass out. I want you conscious for this.
That's enough! [Kill Jalta]
Normally an assassin wouldn't leave this room alive. But Corellia's soaked in enough rebel blood.
I'm in a forgiving mood.
Get the councillor some medical attention. He'll come around.
I approved your occupation. I'm a traitor to my planet, my people....
Silence, Councillor. You're tired--just like this planet. The Empire will help you both.
There is another hero in this story: Corellia's most esteemed councillor.
For fighting to broker peace, I officially name Darbin Sull Prime Minister of Corellia. He will oversee this planet's future, with minimal Imperial oversight.
I thank you, people of Corellia, for your support; and the Empire for this chance to serve.
But my greatest thanks go to you. For ending the rebellion and restoring freedom to Corellia.
But you all deserve my greatest thanks, for ending the rebellion and giving Corellia back its freedom.
I gave Corellia this chance at peace. You owe me your very existence.
Don't forget my mercy.
We're grateful for everything. Be assured of that.
Behave, or the Empire's chains slip around your neck.
Freedom can be taken away.
Corellia's independence is a gift from the Empire. Misuse it--it disappears.
Don't abuse your freedom.
I speak for all our citizens when I say Corellia will never betray the Empire's kindness.
Liberating Corellia wasn't charity. I expect payment in full.
You owe me big, Darbin.
Our people know the value of your heroics. We'll soon repay you tenfold.
We made a good team, Darbin. No one's better suited to lead this planet.
Thanks and congratulations.
Thank you. But I--I must repay the respect.
This is my show, Darbin. Not yours.
Don't hog the spotlight.
Right. Of course. Where are my manners?
Come, councilmen. Show your gratitude--bow to Corellia's new savior.
Join me, councilmen. Let's show our gratitude. Bow to Corellia's saviors.
Councillor Jalta--take a knee!
I don't answer to Imperial puppets.
He can't say that to me! Kill him!
Strike me down. Just know that Corellians always fight back!
When they see your fate, the rebels won't be so quick to oppose us.
Gladly. [Kill Jalta]
I can take your worst Sith tricks! Just know that Corellians will always fight for their planet!
Your pathetic friends will surrender in droves when they see what I do to you.
Gladly. [Kill Jalta]
Go ahead. Execute me like the Empire taught you. You'll never control this planet!
On the contrary, Councillor Jalta. Your death will show your rebel friends the price of defiance.
Gladly. [Kill Jalta]
Do your job, hunter. But know this: Corellians never give in!
I don't care about your politics. Someone needs to shut you up.
Gladly. [Kill Jalta]
I'll die for my planet. Strike me down. I won't be the last Corellian who opposes you.
Your defiance means nothing!
Gladly. [Kill Jalta]
If anyone else agrees with the councillor, speak up.
Thank you, hunter. I believe your point's taken.
Look at your councillor. This is what happens when you spit in the Empire's face!
Anyone else have something to say...? Good.
Normally your tongue would get you killed. But Corellia's seen enough bloodshed.
I'm in a forgiving mood.
Remove the councillor. But don't hurt him. We don't need a martyr on our hands.
Councillor Jalta isn't alone. Corellia still crawls with the confused, the angry, the violent. Let us clear up their misunderstanding.
Citizens of Corellia--kneel to Darth Decimus!
Today, the Dark Council and the Emperor himself look upon you. It is my honor to proclaim Corellia an official member of the Empire!
Right. As prime minister of Corellia, it's my pleasure to declare Corellia an official member of the Empire!
Perhaps you'll share a few words to mark this historic occasion? Something to inspire the galaxy.
One of you should mark this historic occasion with a few words. Something to inspire the galaxy.
The Empire grows stronger every day while the Republic wastes into nothing.
Abandon the Republic.
Even their workhorses--the Jedi--must sacrifice everything to serve.
Soon they'll be hunted to extinction, and their Republic will cease to exist.
Embrace the Empire. It is your destiny.
Soon they'll fade into history, along with their Republic. You don't have to share their fate.
Save yourself. Swear loyalty to the Empire.
Power demands respect. And none are more powerful than me.
Bow to my strength.
Entire planets tremble at my name. They know I could crush them.
Kneel to my greatness. I may show you mercy.
I've broken the Republic's grip on the galaxy. For that alone, you owe me thanks.
Kneel to your savior. Show some respect, and I may return the favor.
All of Corellia reveres your strength, my lord. Those other planets will fall in line.
There are two ways to serve the Empire. I know them both.
Join the Empire.
Prove your worth and make the galaxy take note of your power.
Or rot in slavery, chained to cruel masters. A fitting fate for you worms.
Lucky for you, your fate's not in my hands. Surrender to the Empire. Or else.
Or work as slaves, chained to cruel masters. You don't want that.
Follow the Empire and escape torment. Don't make us take you by force.
Gaze upon me.
Worship my greatness.
Mine is the face of the dark side.
Revere my image. Prepare for my arrival. Because I am coming.
Disappoint me, and feel my wrath!
Shield your eyes against my power. This is mastery of the Force.
I know what you're feeling: jealousy, fear, awe. It's only natural.
Prepare for my coming. Kneel. The galaxy owes me reverence.
You've already got a loyal following, my lord. Right here on Corellia.
On that note, let us close.
You spend you entire life laboring for the Republic. And what do you get for it? Nothing.
The Empire rewards good work.
But the Empire values effort, talent and dedication. It's what makes us superior.
Look at me. I've worked hard to rise through the ranks. Now I stand before you, the pinnacle of Imperial glory.
Join the Empire. Show us what you're capable of, and reap the benefits.
The Republic is a breeding ground for incompetence and failure.
Abandon your weak Republic.
Privileged fools sit on the Senate. Jedi use the Force to create an illusion of hope.
Soon they'll be a footnote in galactic history. But you don't have to share their fate.
Sever your ties with the Republic. Hesitate, and they'll drain the life from you.
Corellia just shed our bond, and we already feel healthier.
Look around. The Republic's hemorrhaging allies.
Just give up already.
Keep resisting, and I'll come knocking. When you see my face, it's over.
Don't get me wrong--I'll take the credits. But you'll fare better if you join the Empire first.
Corellia would join again if we could!
Well spoken. Now, let us close these proceedings.
Corellia's all wrapped up. The Empire's a happy customer. I could do the same for you.
I'm open for business.
Rogue Sith Lords, crime syndicates, kings, queens--I hunt 'em all.
Don't be afraid. It only takes a call.
Better hire this hunter before your enemy does.
A sales pitch wasn't quite what I had in mind, but you've earned it.
I don't do speeches.
Couldn't I say something? I prepared a speech....
Save it for your memoirs, Prime Minister. It's time to close these ceremonies.
Corellia has finally claimed its rightful place with the Empire. The rest of the galaxy will follow. Nothing will stop us from winning this war!
Long live the Empire! Long live the conqueror of Corellia!
Long live the Empire! Long live the conquerors of Corellia!
The battle's begun. Lead them to victory.
This is it--the final battle for Corellia. What's our status, General?
Imperial forces are converging on Capitol Square.
Then we attack. You've proven your worth in battle. Now lead our army against the Jedi Enclave.
The Green Jedi will despair at our superior strength.
It would be my honor.
Cut them down. Don't stop until you've killed their leader.
Your troops better follow my lead.
If your army obeys me, I'm in.
Our forces respect and fear you. They'll follow you against the Jedi's leader.
What do I do with the Green Jedi Council when I find them?
And once I'm inside?
Kill every last Green Jedi Council member. Especially their leader.
The Green Jedi will perish.
Enjoy yourself. But save some energy for the Green Jedi's leader.
Master Arfan Ramos, commander of the Green Jedi. The rebels call him "Corellia's Savior."
He hides within a shell of virtue, but there's anger within him.
We sent extermination squads after Master Ramos. He killed them all, then retreated to his enclave. Now he's single-handedly keeping the rebellion alive.
Follow me, and we'll show the Green Jedi the full might of the Empire!
Together we can crush him.
Let fury guide your hand as we annihilate their pathetic order!
It's time we take our revenge.
These Jedi have defied the Empire for the last time. Today we silence their order and end Corellia's rebellion.
We will respond in kind.
Rousing words. You'll have no trouble facing the Green Jedi Council.
This Jedi may have experience killing you Imps, but he's got nothing on me.
He won't bother you for long.
Finally, a worthy fight.
Respect Master Ramos, provoke his fury and you'll break him.
I don't like my chances.
Don't worry. Master Ramos may be powerful, but there are ways to break his righteous calm.
Fight alongside your companions. Combine your strengths and you'll take Master Ramos down.
But first, the enclave. Darbin Sull will help you breach the Council chambers.
Now go. Today we decide Corellia's future!
Bedoch's dead. I have his access code.
The Green Jedi will soon join their precious artifacts in ruin. Well done.
Finally. Nothing will stop us from striking the Green Jedi's enclave.
But wait... that medal... it's Darth Revan's Cross of Glory, bestowed after the Battle of Rakata Prime. I didn't know it still existed.
Give it to me, and I'll grant you something from my personal collection. An artifact from Trayus Academy--the very place that inspired Revan's dedication to the dark side.
This medal belongs around my neck, not yours.
No. The Cross of Glory's mine.
If you insist. Revan's power will aid your next mission, but you'll also have our full support.
I have no need for Revan's old keepsakes.
Deal. It's all yours.
Thank you. Such an artifact is a rare find, but this will more than compensate you. Now, to business....
Time is running out. Go to the Republic Foundation Museum. Relieve Master Bedoch of his access code.
Few have had the pleasure of my company. Fewer survived the experience. But you've earned my attention.
Together we will end this rebellion and win Corellia for the Empire.
That's why I've chosen each of you. Together we will end this rebellion and win Corellia for the Empire.
The rebel's grip on this planet is weakening. Their pathetic resistance won't survive the day.
Corellia will soon be ours.
Indeed. And there is no one I'd rather have lead our battle.
The rebels have hounded us long enough. I look forward to making them squirm.
I can't wait.
I'm grateful for the help. Win this final battle, and I will fully support your ascension to the Dark Council.
Spoken like a true member of the Dark Council. I'm grateful you'll be leading our battle.
I've taken CEC, routed the Selonians, and conquered the Republic Army. I do not fail.
You were wise to choose me.
Millions serve the Empire. You've risen above them all.
I've never lost a contract. These rebels won't break my streak.
You hired the right hunter.
This operation is more important than your standard contract. Fulfill it, and the Empire will be in your debt.
What's our first move?
We target resistance leaders. With Axial Park won and Darbin Sull embedded in the Republic, the pieces fall into place.
I've been winning your battles while you hide safely up here. This won't be any different.
Together? Yeah, right.
I'll ignore this outburst in light of your impressive service.
Thanks to you, Axial Park is ours and Darbin Sull is embedded with the Republic. All the pieces are falling into place.
Now our only competitors for this planet are the Green Jedi--Corellia's sworn protectors. The rebellion will fester as long as their Council stands.
So run these Green Jedi out of office.
Eradicate the Council's power.
Unfortunately, their enclave is impenetrable.
Why are these Green Jedi so vital to Corellia's defense?
What's so special about them?
They've defiled this planet for generations, perfecting Corellia's defense, researching the Force. All from within their impenetrable enclave.
I don't care what color their robes are. They all bleed red.
So kill these Green Jedi.
It's not that simple. The Green Jedi operate from within the walls of an impenetrable enclave.
That's why you aided Darbin Sull's "escape" in Axial Park. The Corellian councillor has weaseled his way inside the Green Jedi's enclave. Now he awaits my word.
Darth Decimus--what a pleasant surprise.
It's time, Councillor. If you wish to become Corellia's prime minister, prove your worth. Let us into the enclave.
About that... the Green Jedi kinda increased security. I can barely breathe in here.
You need two access codes to get in. I lifted one from a Green Jedi councillor--had to hug the guy to get close. It was awkward.
You said we need two access codes. How do we get the other one?
What about the second code?
If I try to grab another code, I'll blow my cover. I'm afraid you'll need to do some legwork.
Don't deceive me, Darbin.
I'd never lie. Well, not to you. Just hear me out.
Find another Jedi. Hug him, put him to sleep with your boring stories--I don't care. Just get his access code.
Go fetch code number two.
I can't. If more go missing, they'll know it was me. But there's one code you could get.
After you took Axial Park, the entire Green Jedi Council fell back to the enclave... except Master Bedoch.
He's cracked--always prepping for Corellia's "days of darkness." Now they've come, he refuses to abandon the Republic Foundation Museum.
So the Jedi thinks he can save the Republic's precious historic trinkets. How valiant.
Smart, too. Museum security's tighter than most military bases. Plus the building's crawling with shock troops and Green Jedi.
So, you should visit the museum. Take a tour, see the exhibits... grab Master Bedoch's access code.
Lay low, Darbin. When I return, we're breaking into the Green Jedi's compound.
I'll get the code at once.
I'm not really a museum person. At least the Jedi will provide a nice distraction.
If I must.
Word in the enclave is Master Bedoch's locked himself in the museum's vaults. Disable security and you can reach him.
You've served us well, Darbin. Stick close to the Green Jedi. Await my orders.
Master Bedoch will be expecting you. Head to the Republic Foundation Museum, secure his access code, then report back.
And cause some collateral damage. The more relics destroyed, the more Republic history we erase. Breaking spirits is important.
Grab another code yourself, Darbin. Let me know when we're ready to hit the enclave.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
Darbin's cover is too important to risk. Reconsider quickly--the Green Jedi won't bide their time forever.
You're trying my patience.
